product_name: Davis & Sanford Explorer Tripod with Pan Head
long_description: The lightweight Davis & Sanford Explorer tripod with pan head is perfect for digital, video and still cameras weighing up to 4 lbs. 3-way fluid head features 2-way tilt plus pan, a quick-release plate and a bubble level on the base. 25mm aluminum legs feature 3 sections, quick-release leg locks and a leg support brace with lock. 11 in. geared center post with carry hook creates a maximum height of 60 in. and a minimum height of 22 in. The Davis & Sanford Explorer tripod features a carry handle, nonslip rubber feet and a travel bag.
short_description: The lightweight Davis & Sanford Explorer tripod with pan head is perfect for digital, video and still cameras weighing up to 4 lbs.
